Module com.ning.breakout

Package com.ning.breakout.view.graphics

package com.ning.breakout.view.graphics
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.ning.breakout.view
     
  • Class
    Description
    Ball
    Ball is the abstract base class for all ball classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all ball classes.
    Brick
    Brick is the abstract base class for all brick classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all brick classes.
    CementBrick
    CementBrick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class CrackedBrick, with full strength of 2.
    ClayBrick
    ClayBrick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Brick, with full strength of 1.
    CrackedBrick
    CrackedBrick is the abstract class extends from the abstract class Brick.
    GoldenBrick
    Golden brick is the concrete class extends from the abstract class CrackedBrick, with full strength of 4.
    Movable
    Graphics class implements Interface Movable should be able to move in the game board.
    Paddle
    Paddle is the abstract base class for all paddle classes which defines the common attributes and behaviors of all paddle classes.
    RubberBall
    RubberBall is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Ball, with radius of 5.
    RubberPaddle
    RubberPaddle is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Paddle, with width 150 and height 10.
    SteelBrick
    SteelBrick is the concrete class extend from the abstract class Brick, with full strength of 1.
